channel.title: [CrackMe] NoREpls - Part 2
channel.description: # Backstory `edgyReggie` has looked over the [previous thread](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-1/2974) once again and has thought that using such an easy encoding method just isn't going to cut it. He has created a new serial number and obfuscated it yet again, and is _confident_ that nobody can find it. He has also noticed that people have been complaining about the lack of persistence of the registration and has addressed the issue. One thing that `edgyReggie` is very concerned about is that crackers are defacing his software and removing his name, thus destroying even his reputation on top of his earnings! He will be thinking very hard for a solution to fix this problem... ## Difficulty #### Author Assigned Level: Newbie #### Community Assigned Level: [poll type=regular] * Newbie * Wannabe * Hacker * Wizard * Guru [/poll] ---------- ## Goal Your goal is to achieve the "full" version of the software, i.e. removing all nags that you see and unlocking all features of the program. Your secondary (optional) goal is to discover the new serial number. ---------- ## Rules of Engagement None. ----- ## Research Material [details=Potential spoilers in here!] * [MSDN - CreateFile](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa363858(v=vs.85).aspx) * [MSDN - ReadFile](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa365467(v=vs.85).aspx) * [MSDN - WriteFile](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa365747(v=vs.85).aspx) [/details] ---------- ## Binary #### Preview (look and design may not be accurate): #### Revised version 1.2.1 [MediaFire - http://www.mediafire.com/file/jk4oe2ky3kpq3zm/NoREpls1.2.1.exe](http://www.mediafire.com/file/jk4oe2ky3kpq3zm/NoREpls1.2.1.exe) [VirusTotal - https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/3300de4dbec0b91bdcc08a16a1f3e459937dcfcde8a00ec0ff7579b2cae2504a/analysis/1500552281/](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/3300de4dbec0b91bdcc08a16a1f3e459937dcfcde8a00ec0ff7579b2cae2504a/analysis/1500552281/) #### Previous version 1.2 [MediaFire - http://www.mediafire.com/file/nv5f8zs117gpusm/NoREpls1.2.exe](http://www.mediafire.com/file/nv5f8zs117gpusm/NoREpls1.2.exe) [VirusTotal - https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/e044fb6d5973aabba1159bc83973eec78f590fd958b3f423829bc5399b231101/analysis/1500547918/](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/e044fb6d5973aabba1159bc83973eec78f590fd958b3f423829bc5399b231101/analysis/1500547918/) Good luck!

item.title: [CrackMe] NoREpls - Part 2
item.dc:creator: Rasty
item.description:
Hello, this post seems really really old but hope you will see this and reply. I’m new with re and currently using IDA pro. I’m curious which dissasembler do you use? and how were you able to get decrypt version of license. Since as I understand it encrypts the user input and compares it to deab67dde2001dc1a078456015765ed6. Your answer would really help :). thanks in advance.

Read full topic

item.description:
Don’t worry about it, you’d probably have never gotten it anyway due to its nature. Good job nevertheless!

Read full topic

item.title: [CrackMe] NoREpls - Part 2
item.dc:creator: Xorus
item.description:
Really enjoyed the challenge!

[spoiler]I managed to crack it with a single byte change.

Changing the “test eax, eax” to “test edi, eax” forced the application to accept incorrect serials as it invalidated the test.
I spent a good deal of time trying to figure out the encryption, but I couldn’t figure it out unfortunately.

With a License.lic file containing “SERIAL=NOREPLS-0000-0000-0000-0000” it starts up in registered mode.
[/spoiler]

Read full topic

Hi, thanks for part 2.

I just figure out the mechanism behind checking the serial number, but for now I have no luck with cracking your license key. So I have modified your binary for accepting my serial number. Sorry, edgyReggie

item.title: [CrackMe] NoREpls - Part 2
item.dc:creator: dtm
item.description:
Backstory

edgyReggie has looked over the previous thread once again and has thought that using such an easy encoding method just isn’t going to cut it. He has created a new serial number and obfuscated it yet again, and is confident that nobody can find it. He has also noticed that people have been complaining about the lack of persistence of the registration and has addressed the issue. One thing that edgyReggie is very concerned about is that crackers are defacing his software and removing his name, thus destroying even his reputation on top of his earnings! He will be thinking very hard for a solution to fix this problem…

Difficulty

Author Assigned Level: Newbie

Community Assigned Level:

Click to view the poll.

Goal

Your goal is to achieve the “full” version of the software, i.e. removing all nags that you see and unlocking all features of the program.
Your secondary (optional) goal is to discover the new serial number.

Rules of Engagement

None.

Research Material

Potential spoilers in here! (click for more details)

Binary

Preview (look and design may not be accurate):

Revised version 1.2.1

VirusTotal - https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/3300de4dbec0b91bdcc08a16a1f3e459937dcfcde8a00ec0ff7579b2cae2504a/analysis/1500552281/

[MediaFire - http://www.mediafire.com/file/nv5f8zs117gpusm/NoREpls1.2.exe](http://www.mediafire.com/file/nv5f8zs117gpusm/NoREpls1.2.exe)

VirusTotal - https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/e044fb6d5973aabba1159bc83973eec78f590fd958b3f423829bc5399b231101/analysis/1500547918/

Good luck!
